role.argrole: entity arg0 is close to being

example.parse: (IP (ADVP (AD 例如)) (NP-SBJ (CP (WHNP-2 (-NONE- *OP*)) (CP (IP (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *pro*)) (VP (NP-MNR (-NONE- *T*-2)) (PP-DIR (P 对) (NP (NN 青少年))) (VP (VV 实施) (NP-OBJ (NN 宵禁))))) (DEC 的))) (NP (NN 方式))) (VP (ADVP (AD 就)) (VP (VV 近乎) (NP-OBJ (NN 独断)))))
example.arg: *OP* *pro* *T*-2 对 青少年 实施 宵禁 的 方式
